function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Socialising in residential spaces may expose occupants to pathogens carried by visitors, including asymptomatic individuals with COVID-19.","Impact":"Unintentional spread of contagious diseases within the household, leading to illness and potential complications.","Mitigation":"Implement functional differentiation and compartmentalization of internal spaces to reduce cross-contamination.","Technologies":"Individual filter system for centrally ducted air conditioning, separate workstations for self-isolation.","People":"Occupants of the residential space, visitors to the residence.","Owner":"Architects, interior designers, homeowners."}]}
